"T:Requiem of The Specter's Grudge":
"We're once again detecting [Persona]
readings within the altered space it created.
It seems that its residual grudge against us
formed a new body after it was defeated.
If left alone, it'll destroy the entire universe.
All ARKS, move to intercept!
――――――――――――――――――――
Max Damage Cap: 999999
Failure: Fail objective, time limit expires"

"The operation begins here.
Our objective is to enter
the altered space and
destroy Dark Falz Persona."

"It aims to destroy the entire universe...
Let's combine all the powers of ARKS
and stop it right here, right now!"
